head.pageTitle: Expert Trading & Distribution Worldwide - Greenex Energy

content.paragraph: Greenex Energy is an emerging leader in base oils and petrochemical products trade, distributing them to serve the markets in Africa, Europe, Asia and the Americas. The company stands for high-quality commodities. As an independent service company, we specialize in physical Base Oil and Petrochemicals Trading and Distribution worldwide and strive to always provide our customers with the best tailored business solutions. This includes our team’s profound expertise in refined base oil and petrochemicals, proven track record in sourcing, processing, trading activities, mastering of financing services, optimization of logistics operations and storage facilities.
The total satisfaction of our customers and partners is our absolute ambition. In order to reach this excellence, we have built Greenex Energy on three main pillars:

list: team of experienced, reliable and proven professionals

content.paragraph: We commit on establishing strong sustainable and durable relationships with our customers and partners, which are based on trust, expertise and performance. Furthermore, the securing of the commodities supplies today and in the future, is at the very heart of our business. Our international team of high-level industry experts unifies deep knowledge and a broad contact- and partner network within the markets. This strategic combination allows us to access a very broad range of Base Oil, Petrochemicals Categories, HVO, biodiesel, feedstocks, glycerine and ethanol and to safely deliver them worldwide.
We invite you to experience our unique way of doing business and are looking forward to solving your base oil, petrochemicals, HVO, biodiesel, feedstocks, glycerine and ethanol challenges.

column.subtitle: Products Trading
column.text: With our extensive and successful track record in base oil products trading, we are connecting markets, while progressively expanding our trading activities around the world. While seizing market opportunities and actively improving our supplier network, we are able to constantly optimize your base oil supply.

column.subtitle: Logistics & Distribution
column.text: Logistics infrastructure and high-level long-term logistics partnerships ensures us almost indefinite flexibility when it comes to planning and optimization of our logistics. Greenex Energy SA is your expert in bridging geographical distances and provides the operations linked to successful base oil trading.

column.subtitle: Base Oil Products
column.text: We propose a large portfolio of base oil products of first, second and third group. Our supplier network gives us the necessary flexibility and enables us to meet any your technical and volume requirements. Thanks to our solid expertise in different markets, we deliver our products tailored to your needs and geographical location.

content.paragraph: Greenex Energy operates a network of storage facilities located in the ARA area, the Baltics, Mediterranean sea area. In order to constantly optimize our logistic operations and improve proximity to the consumer markets, we are continuously expanding our facilities in strategic locations.

To meet with the highest international standards and customers’ expectations, we integrate only first class facilities & equipment in our operations. This allows us to maintain high order-lead time and immediate delivery of our products, as well as the availability to execute blending operations of top quality virgin paraffinic base oils.
We deliver through a vast network and according to your needs:

list: ex-shore tanks (Dordrecht, Netherlands / Latvia, Baltics, Antwerp for ex-shoretanks)
in flexi-tanks (single- / multi-layer) or in ISO-tanks
